name: Entangled Dashing
description:
Two balls are joined together by a spring, they have to cooperate by opening and closing doors traveling through the halls until they reach the end of the level (two spheres). They move by launching themselves with force increasing with time, doors are opened by pressure plates.  

move with S and L

Recomended to play with another person but it can be played alone.

Audio made by: Juanes 

Levels design by: Juanes & ALVAROCA

Code & art by: ALVAROCA
